List<Account> accList = [SELECT Id FROM Account WHERE Name = 'Lexidata Corporation' limit 10];
System.debug(accList.size());
DELETE [SELECT Id FROM JBCXM__UsageTracker__c];
List<String> utList = new List<String>{'Emails Sent Count', 'Files Upload Count', 'Network Traffic Created'};
List<JBCXM__PickList__c> pkList = [SELECT Id FROM JBCXM__PickList__c WHERE Name IN: utList];
List<JBCXM__UsageTracker__c> usTList = new List<JBCXM__UsageTracker__c>();

JBCXM__UsageTracker__c ut;
List<String> modulesList = new List<String>{'Customers', 'Transactions', 'Adoption', 'Rules Engine', 'Retention'};
List<String> userNames = new List<String>{'Giribabu', 'Somu', 'Srinivas', 'Sunand', 'Sri Vidya', 'Sai Ram', 'Hitesh'};

for(Account acc : accList) {
    integer a = 0 , b = 0, c = 0;
    for(integer i =0 ;i<20; i++) {
	ut = new JBCXM__UsageTracker__c(JBCXM__Account__c= acc.Id,
										JBCXM__AdoptionMeasure__c = pkList.get(a).Id,
										JBCXM__ActionTime__c = datetime.now().addDays(-i),
										JBCXM__Module__c = modulesList.get(b),
										JBCXM__UserName__c = userNames.get(c)); 
	usTList.add(ut);
    a++;b++;c++;
    if(a==pkList.size()) {a=0;}
    if(b==modulesList.size()){b=0;}
    if(c==userNames.size()){c=0;}
}

}
System.debug(usTList.size());
insert usTList;
